page.title: Chemotype Calculator
page.subtitle: Enter a 6-digit chemotype and discover the expected effects and recommendations.

1.name: Desmethoxyyangonin
1.description: Increases dopamine, promotes focus and mild euphoria

2.name: Dihydrokavain
2.description: Strong muscle relaxation and pain-relieving effect

3.name: Yangonin
3.description: Acts on the endocannabinoid system, mildly stimulating

4.name: Kavain
4.description: Main active ingredient for anxiety relief and mental clarity

5.name: Dihydromethysticin
5.description: Strongly sedating, slower breakdown – Tudei marker

unknown.label: Invalid
unknown.description: Please enter a valid 6-digit chemotype (digits 1-6, each exactly once).

tudei.label: Tudei
tudei.description: This chemotype indicates Tudei Kava. DHM (5) in position 1 or 2 means very long duration of effect with possible side effects.

heady.label: Heady
heady.description: Kavain-dominant variety with primarily mental effects. Ideal for social occasions and creative work.

heady_balanced.label: Heady / Balanced
heady_balanced.description: Balanced variety with Kavain and DHK in the first positions. Combines mental clarity with physical relaxation.

heavy.label: Heavy
heavy.description: Dihydrokavain-dominant variety with primarily physical effects. Ideal for relaxation and stress relief.

balanced.label: Balanced
balanced.description: Balanced variety with a mix of mental and physical effects. Versatile use.

warnings.tudeiGeneral: DHM (5) in a prominent position – typical for Tudei Kava
warnings.tudeiSideEffects: Possible side effects: nausea, long 'hangover', drowsiness
warnings.dhmPosition1: DHM in position 1: Very strong, long-lasting sedation
warnings.dhmPosition2: DHM in position 2: Increased sedation, longer duration of effect

strengths.headyClear: Clear, focused effect without strong sedation
strengths.headyMood: Good mood enhancement and anxiety relief
strengths.headyBalancedBest: Ideal combination of head and body effects
strengths.headyBalancedBody: Mild muscle relaxation without strong sedation
strengths.balancedBoth: Balanced effect on body and mind
strengths.dmyDopamine: DMY prominent: Enhanced dopamine effect, more euphoria

headyUse: During the day or early evening

anleitung.title: How it works
anleitung.paragraph1: The chemotype is a 6-digit code that lists the six main kavalactones in descending order of their concentration. The first digit represents the kavalactone with the highest concentration, the last one for the lowest.

rules.label: Position 1 = 4 (Kavain)
rules.text: "Heady" Kava – mental effect, focus, anxiety relief

rules.label: Position 1 or 2 = 5 (DHM)
rules.text: ⚠️ Tudei Kava – very long effect, possible side effects
